head.title: Tomorrow River Schools | Teaching Tomorrow's Children | Amherst WI54406

div.div:
Due to the COVID -19 situation and Governor Evers Order - all schools in the Tomorrow River School District will remain closed for the remainder of the 2019-20 school year. Our Online Charter Virtual School is open as usual. Although the school buildings are closed we will still be providing instruction and meals to our students. The Department of Health Services Secretary extended the current Safer at Home Order under Order #28. This order goes into effect on April 24 and will remain in effect until 8:00 a.m. on May 26, 2020.
Please continue to check our announcement page at https://www.amherst.k12.wi.us/district/announcements.cfm#anid45 for updates.
